description: If you believe the hype ChatGPT, GPT4 and Bard are going to transform the way we live and work. We've already seen applications and software built with ChatGPT being deployed in everything from customer services to healthcare. Large Language Models (LLMs) such as GPT3.5 and GPT4 which underpin ChatGPT are designed to be general purpose providing the foundations on which to build a wide range of software and services - but what are the ethical challenges with foundation models? In this talk I will set out key considerations all developers should address before building on ChatGPT (or its competitors).
title: Shaky Foundations: The ethics of building on ChatGPT
